messages: bc724681935f49bbcd8156cfb716d7ce (22:40): hey how do i embed formatting info in my file
bc724681935f49bbcd8156cfb716d7ce (22:41): like tab width and stuff
bc724681935f49bbcd8156cfb716d7ce (22:43): would this work? // vi:et sw=4 smarttab
0c40c1bf00d55d35ab17baf2cbec36f8 (22:43): Try it and see, there are a couple different modeline formats.
0c40c1bf00d55d35ab17baf2cbec36f8 (22:45): :help 'modelines' and what form of modeline were you trying?
bc724681935f49bbcd8156cfb716d7ce (22:46): i used the first form
0792377b948579515cfdf726e83cbc23 (22:51): smarttab is not in vi so use vim:
0792377b948579515cfdf726e83cbc23 (22:51): although that's not your real issue
0792377b948579515cfdf726e83cbc23 (22:51): is it in the first 5 / last 5 lines of the file?
bc724681935f49bbcd8156cfb716d7ce (22:51): ok so it has to be vim
e08552c860faa32d1cddd42d124f5208 (22:51): hi, can I somehow configure vim to get to the line where it was after doing some :%s cmd ?
e08552c860faa32d1cddd42d124f5208 (22:54): tpope: '' doesnt do anything too
bc724681935f49bbcd8156cfb716d7ce (22:56): tpope, does that output tell you anything
0792377b948579515cfdf726e83cbc23 (22:56): pundai|work: it tells me that that is not the problem...
bc724681935f49bbcd8156cfb716d7ce (22:57): i dont know what im doing wrong
bc724681935f49bbcd8156cfb716d7ce (22:57): can you give me an example from on eof your files
0792377b948579515cfdf726e83cbc23 (22:57): pundai|work: paste the exact line, including any comment characters and white space
4969e383a78d3407b54160eb0de4b90b (22:58): I usually put mine at the top
4969e383a78d3407b54160eb0de4b90b (22:58): You need to :set modeline   as well
4969e383a78d3407b54160eb0de4b90b (22:58): 'modelines just says how many lines it will look from the top or bottom, if it decides to look for a modeline.
0792377b948579515cfdf726e83cbc23 (22:59): the reason I mentioned modelines is that a while back debian defaulted to modelines=0, for reasons I never understood
bc724681935f49bbcd8156cfb716d7ce (22:59): so // vim: modeline et sw=4 smarttab?
bc724681935f49bbcd8156cfb716d7ce (22:59): ok but it is within 5 anyway
0792377b948579515cfdf726e83cbc23 (23:01): pundai|work: in a brand new vim?
bc724681935f49bbcd8156cfb716d7ce (23:01): do you mean modeline or modelines
0792377b948579515cfdf726e83cbc23 (23:02): modeline and modelines=5 is the correct values
bc724681935f49bbcd8156cfb716d7ce (23:06): im using gvim on windows if it helps
0792377b948579515cfdf726e83cbc23 (23:07): that prohibits all config files from loading
bc724681935f49bbcd8156cfb716d7ce (23:09): yeah i did it all
bc724681935f49bbcd8156cfb716d7ce (23:09): its ok i'll google for a while
bc724681935f49bbcd8156cfb716d7ce (23:10): heh i think it was workign the whole time
0792377b948579515cfdf726e83cbc23 (23:12): after the last step I started to have a hunch
